TopicTitle: Use Microsoft Sidewinder pro without the PPJoy Solution

Articles.Content: I have read plenty of articles on how to get my joystick to work with the ppjoy solution but i dont feel secure knocking out one of my security features to accomplish it. So if there is another way id like to know.

I use Pinnacle Game Profiler with my logitech, should work with Sidewinder, but it is a pay for program. You do get a free trial with it. To me its well worth it, I use it for all my games and you don't have to turn off any security.
